TWY P4 BTN TWY M AND TWY R CONSTRUCTION PHASE 2 ACTIVE. REF AIP SUP IFR 04/24. ******** LIDO RMK ******** CONSTRUCTION PHASE 2 (BA2): AUG 2024 - APR 2025 DURING THE BA2 PHASE, TWY P4 WILL BE CLOSED BETWEEN TWY M AND TWY R.STANDS B05, B06, B07, B08 AND V61A WILL REMAIN CLOSED DURING THE BA2 PHASE.STAND B04 WILL BE REDUCED TO CODE LETTER C AIRCRAFT AND WILL BE ADJUSTED. STAND B03 WILL BE ADJUSTED IN ITS LAYOUT. STAND B09 WILL BE ADJUSTED TO BE AVAILABLE TO CODE LETTER E AIRCRAFT AGAIN.STANDS V61, V62 AND V63 WILL REMAIN PUSH-BACK POSITIONS DURING THE BA2 PHASE.THE DE-ICING PADS IN THE WEST WILL HAVE TO BE ADJUSTED AS FOLLOWS: - PAD 1 WILL BE DESIGNED TRANSVERSELY IN THE AREA OF STANDS V62 AND V63 FOR AIRCRAFT UP TO CODE LETTER C. (USE ALTERNATELY WITH THE OTHER PAD 1) - ACCESS TO PAD 1 WILL EXCLUSIVELY BE VIA TWY L7. - FOR THE DE-ICING OF THE A380, THE CURRENT PAD 3 (TWY R) WILL REMAIN AVAILABLE BUT WILL BE DESIGNATED AS PAD 1 DURING THE BA2 PHASE AND WILL BE USED ALTERNATELY WITH THE NEW PAD 1. - THE CURRENT PAD 4 WILL BE DESIGNATED AS PAD 2 AND WILL ONLY BE AVAILABLE TO AIRCRAFT UP TO CODE LETTER E. - PAD 3 AND PAD 4 WILL BE CREATED IN THE AREA OF STANDS V75 AND V76 FOR AIRCRAFT UP TO CODE LETTER C. ******** END OF LIDO RMK ********

DEPARTURE FLIGHTS MODIFIED : THE NICE COTE D'AZUR AIRPORT ESTABLISHES A PERMANENT AND AUTOMATIC DATA EXCHANGE WITH THE NETWORK MANAGEMENT OPERATIONS CENTRE AS AN 'ANI' AIRPORT (ADVANCED NETWORK INTEGRATED), IN ADDITION TO THE EXISTING 'ACDM' (AIRPORT COLLABORATIVE DECISION MAKING) MESSAGE EXCHANGE. AN 'ANI' AIRPORT HAS FULLY ADOPTED THE AIRPORT-'CDM' (COLLABORATIVE DECISION MAKING) CONCEPT BY PROVIDING TO 'NMOC' THE FULL SET OF 'DPI' MESSAGES (DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION: 'PDPI, EDPI, TDPIT, TDPIS, ADPI AND CDPI') AND 'GAPI' MESSAGES (GENERAL ARRIVAL PLANNING INFORMATION). THIS ACTIVATION ADDITIONALLY COVERS THE INTEGRATION OF NEW 'TTOT' VALUES ('TTTOT, ETTOT, CTTOT') IN 'EDPI', 'TDPIT', 'TDPIS' MESSAGES. WITH THE INTRODUCTION OF 'PDPI', NEW VALUES IN 'DPI' AND 'GAPI' MESSAGES EXCHANGES WITH EUROCONTROL SYSTEMS, THE ATFM NETWORK MAY BE IMPACTED AS EARLY AS 48 HOURS BEFORE EOBT AND MAY BE USED FOR AIR TRAFFIC FLOW MANAGEMENT (ATFM) PURPOSES. REF AIP AD2 LFMN.22.4

ADS-B DATA FOR ECRA (EUROPEAN CONNECTED REGIONAL AIRPORTS PROGRAMME) OPERATIONS. 1.1.IN ORDER TO COOPERATE WITH ADS-B RECEIVER USED BY AIRPORT OPERATOR AND EUROCONTROL FOR USE OF THE ECRA PROGRAMME AT EINDHOVEN AIRPORT,PILOTS OF MODE S EQUIPPED ACFT WITH ADS-B FUNCTIONALITIES WHEN OPERATING ON THE GROUND SHALL: A)SELECT AUTO MODE AND THE ASSIGNED MODE A CODE OR B)IF AUTOMODE IS NOT AVAILABLE, SELECT ON (E.G.XPDR) AND THE ASSIGNED MODE A CODE. -FROM THE REQUEST FOR TOWER PUSH-BACK OR TAXI,WHICHEVER IS EARLIER -AFTER LANDING,CONTINUOUSLY UNTIL THE ACFT IS FULLY PARKED IN ITS STAND. -WHEN THE ACFT IS FULLY PARKED, FLT CREW SHALL SELECT STBY. 1.1.2.WHENEVER THE ACFT IS CAPABLE OF REPORTING ACFT IDENTIFICATION (I.E.CALLSIGN USED IN FLT), THIS SHOULD BE ENTERED (THROUGH THE FMS OR THE TRANSPONDER CONTROL PANEL) AT THE TIME OF THE REQUEST FOR TOWED PUSH-BACK OR TAXI, WHICHEVER IS EARLIER. 1.1.3.AIR CREW MUST USE THE ICAO DEFINED FORMAT TO ENTER THE ACFT IDENTIFICATION. 1.1.4.TO ENSURE THAT THE PERFORMANCE OF SYSTEMS BASED ON SSR FREQ (INCLUDING AIRBORNE TCAS AND SSR RADARS) IS NOT COMPROMISED, TCAS SHOULD NOT BE SELECTED BEFORE RECEIVING CLEARANCE TO LINE UP, AND SHOULD BE DESELECTED AFTER VACATING THE RWY.

IN CASE OF AN UNAUTHORISED XNG OF THE ACT STOP BAR, FOUR VERY BRIGHT, FLG RED SFC LGT AT THE CAT I HLDG PSN AS WELL AS TWO RED LGT EACH ON BOTH SHOULDERS OF TWY BTN THE CAT I AND CAT II/III HLDG PSN ARE ACT. SX0060/22 AIP SUPPLEMENT EBBU/FIR - RESTRICTIONS RELATED TO THE RUSSIAN INVASION OF UKRAINE - 08SEP22-UFN 1 AVOIDANCE OF OPERATIONS IN THE CRISIS AREA BELGIAN AIR OPERATORS AND OWNERS OF AIRCRAFT REGISTERED IN BELGIUM SHALL NOT ENTER UKBU, UKLV, UKBV, UKDV, UKFV, UKOV, URRV. FLIGHT OPERATIONS SHALL ALSO BE AVOIDED WITHIN THE BUFFER ZONE EXTENDING OUT TO 200 NM ALONG THE UKRAINE/RUSSIA BORDER. OPERATIONS WITHIN LUUU SHALL ONLY BE UNDERTAKEN IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE APPLICABLE AERONAUTICAL PUBLICATIONS ISSUED BY THE REPUBLIC OF MOLDOVA. ADDITIONAL RISK ASSESSMENT AND FLIGHT PLANNING DECISIONS SHALL BE TAKEN BEFORE OPERATING UUWV. 2 RESTRICTIONS FOR RUSSIAN OPERATORS LL RUSSIAN REGISTERED AIRCRAFT AND AIRCRAFT OWNED, CHARTERED OR OPERATED, OR OTHERWISE CONTROLLED BY NATURAL OR LEGAL PERSONS FROM THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION OR BY OPERATORS HOLDING AN AIR OPERATOR CERTIFICATE (AOC) ISSUED BY THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION AUTHORITIES ARE PROHIBITED TO ENTER, EXIT OR OVERFLY BELGIAN AND LUXEMBOURGISH AIRSPACE, EXCEPT FOR HUMANITARIAN, SAR AND LEASED AIRCRAFT ONE-WAY RETURN FLIGHTS WITH THE PERMISSION OF THE APPROPRIATE BELGIAN OR LUXEMBOURGISH AUTHORITIES AND IN CASE OF EMERGENCY LANDING OR EMERGENCY OVERFLIGHT.
